q_en: What is the production progress of the Dress ordered by Emily? Please represent it in percentage.
gt:
Hey there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the production progress for the dresses ordered by Emily. Here's a breakdown of the progress in percentage for each sewing task:

| Sewing Task ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Progress Percentage |
|----------------|----------------|------------------|---------------------|
| 11             | 140            | 100              | 71.43%              |
| 12             | 150            | 120              | 80.00%              |
| 13             | 130            | 120              | 92.31%              |
| 14             | 120            | 120              | 100.00%             |

It looks like the sewing tasks are coming along nicely, with some already completed! üéâ Keep up the great work! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! üòä

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Emily';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Emily"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '3';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for the customer "Emily"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM products_types WHERE description = 'Dress';
steps.description: Retrieve the product type ID for the product type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM products WHERE products_type_id = '3';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products of type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (3, 11) AND product_id IN (5, 13, 21, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the orders by "Emily" that include products of type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT planned_number, completed_number FROM sewing_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (11, 12, 13, 14);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task details for the relevant order_product IDs

steps.sql: SELECT (completed_number / planned_number) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM sewing_tasks WHERE order_product_id IN (11, 12, 13, 14);
steps.description: Calculate the production progress percentage for each sewing task
